name: Verdent AI
description: Stand-alone AI coding tool from China with significant updates announced in December 2025.

name: AWS Kiro
description: Amazon's AI coding tool launched globally with structured AI coding capabilities, autonomous agents for individual developers, and CLI support.

name: Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory
description: AWS's managed service for AI agent memory management with cross-session persistence, production-ready long-term memory capabilities.

name: Mistral Devstral 2
description: Open-source coding-focused language model with interactive chat interface, file manipulation, and code searching capabilities. Licensed under Apache 2.0.

name: Letta Context-Bench
description: Benchmark for evaluating how well language models handle agentic context engineering and AI coding agent capabilities.

name: Conare
description: macOS app for Claude Code that provides context management and project persistence across coding sessions.
